subject: Simsonn VAM Pro with Simjack Pedals
description_text:
Hey, I have Simjack Pedals. Can I use your VAM Pro if I buy the full set with the control box?

Or is mounting impossible?

Thank you!
Gabriel

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for iOS.

conversations.body_text: Hi Gabriel Baroch Castellvi,  It is compatible with our pedals, but requires using our control box and the SIMSONN Manager software.

Hi, thank you so much! So it is compatible means the mounting pattern is the same between Simagic and Simson Haptics? I have adapter for Simjack to Simagic Haptic. So this one I could use for Simsonn VAM pro?

Thank you!

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for iOS.

-------- Original Message --------

And another question I have: I want to buy your dual mode shifter. But I need the anti slip handle. Where can I buy it in your shop and is the new dual mode shifter compatible with the longer 20cm handle in your shop? (2. Picture here). I’m planing to make a bigger order so would be greatful about your help.

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for iOS.

-------- Original Message --------
Hi Gabriel Baroch Castellvi,     This part is included in the parts list.   https://www.simsonn.com/collections/accessories

2 questions, please answer with yes or no. I need it precise.

1. Is the 20 cm handle from your website compatible with the new DUAL MODE shifter?

2. Is the Simsonn VAM haptics compatible, is the mounting pattern the same between Simagic and Simson Haptics? I have adapter for Simjack to Simagic Haptic. So this one I could use for Simsonn VAM pro?

If you can answer these questions precise I would make an order >350€. So please help me. Thank you!
Gabriel

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for iOS.

-------- Original Message --------

Could you please answer? Thank you!

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for iOS.

-------- Original Message --------
Hi Gabriel Baroch Castellvi,  I am currently helping you confirm these two questions.

Hi Gabriel Baroch Castellvi,  Regarding your first question, my answer is “Yes.” For the second question, the answer is “No.” We have a U-shaped bracket that can support Simjack pedals for horizontal installation.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-haptic-reactor-mounting-brackets
